Play Store Check Thanks you for installing the app from Google Play Store. Enjoy. It seems like you installed this icon pack from outside of Google Play Store. You will not be able to use it.
Yo! Check out %s Check out %1$s, this icon pack is really cool! %2$s
Navigation drawer Tap here or swipe from left edge of the screen to open navigation drawer Apply icon pack Tap here to apply %s Search Tap here to search an icon Select missed app Tap here to select missed app for icon request Select all missed apps Tap here to select all missed apps for icon request Send icon request Tap here to send selected missed apps Premium icon request Tap here to buy premium icon request package, with premium icon request you can get your requested apps faster. Wallpaper options Tap and hold here to show wallpaper options, %s apply wallpaper. download or Preview wallpaper Tap here to preview full size of the wallpaper Save wallpaper Tap here to download and save wallpaper to your device so you can use it later Apply wallpaper Tap here to set wallpaper as homescreen background

Installed Launcher Supported Launchers
%1$s Launcher doesn\'t support direct apply but you can apply %2$s manually from the launcher settings. Tap and hold on homescreen - Settings - Icon Pack - choose %s. Unable to launch %s settings %s Launcher is not installed. Do you want to open Google Play Store to download and install it?
%s Launcher is not installed. Please try again after installing the launcher.
CM Theme Manager is not available on this device Unable to launch CM Theme Manager, you can try to apply Icon Pack manually from Settings.
To apply this Icon Pack open Settings - Display - Home Screen - Theme LG Home is not available on this device Unable to launch LG Home Settings, you can try to apply Icon Pack manually from Settings. LG Home with Android Nougat no longer supports Icon Pack. You need a custom launcher to use Icon Pack.
%s Launcher doesn\'t support any icon pack, so you can\'t use this icon pack with this launcher. You can try a third-party app to use this icon pack in %2$s launcher. Do you want to install it?
Unable to load icons Icon Shape No bookmarks found. Bookmark icons to quickly access them here. %d selected
Icon Request Select apps to request Not requested Already requested
Building request … Sending request to Arctic Manager... Error occurred while sending request to Arctic Manager. Error is %s Successfully sent request to Arctic Manager Fetching latest data … Unable to build icon request Unable to read appfilter.xml Please check your request again. Because you are trying to request app that was already requested. Choose the app you want to use to send the icon request You\'re using an older version of this icon pack. The requested icons may be included in the latest version. Please update your app to latest version to request icons. Unable to load data from server. Please, check your network connection. An error occurred while fetching/reading data from the server.
You are only able to make %d request(s) with regular request. You have requested %d icon(s). You can buy Premium Requests to request more icons. Icon request limit will be reset on every update.
Regular Icon Request Get your icon requested and developer will try to include icons you requested. Total\n%d request Used\n%d request Available\n%d request
Premium Icon Request Make sure your phone connected to internet before sending a premium request Premium icon request is pay to request. You can get your requested apps faster by using premium icon request. Buy Total\n%d request Used\n%d request Available\n%d request You still have %d premium request. You need to use all of them before buying a premium request package again. You only have %d premium request(s), but you selected %d app(s). \n\nYou need to use all of your premium requests before using regular request again.
Unable to use Premium Request, make sure you have stable internet connection and try again. Go to Settings to rebuild Premium Requests.
Rebuilding Premium Request … You have not made a Premium Request
You still have a Premium Icon Request package. Open Settings, choose \"Restore Purchases\" to restore it.
You need to buy a premium icon request package to make icon requests
